mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likey (job_id, pf_id, comment_id, user_id) VALUES (#{jobId}, #{pfId}, #{commentId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM likey WHERE job_id=#{jobId} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM likey WHERE pf_id=#{pfId} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM likey WHERE comment_id=#{commentId} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM likey l WHERE l.likey_id=LAST_INSERT_ID()

SELECT p.pf_id AS pfId, p.pf_title AS pfTitle, p.pf_location AS pfLocation, p.pf_genre AS pfGenre, CASE WHEN p.pf_price = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS isPrice, p.pf_start_date AS pfStartDate, p.pf_deadline AS pfDeadline, CASE WHEN p.pf_deadline >= CURDATE() THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS isDead, p.pf_thumbnail AS pfThumbnail, p.pf_agerating AS pfAgeRating, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS viewCount FROM performance p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pf_id, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM view WHERE pf_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY pf_id ) v ON p.pf_id = v.pf_id WHERE p.pf_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT pf_id FROM likey WHERE user_id = #{userId} -- 사용자 ID에 따라 좋아요한 공연을 검색 ) AND p.pf_status != 'deleted' ORDER BY pfId DESC;

SELECT j.job_id AS jobId, j.job_genre AS jobGenre, j.job_deadline AS jobDeadline, j.job_content_title AS jobContentTitle, u.user_profile_img AS userProfileImg, u.user_nickname AS userNickname, u.user_career AS userCareer, u.user_id AS userId, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS viewCount, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS commentCount, COALESCE(l.likey_count, 0) AS likeyCount, IF(DATEDIFF(j.job_deadline, CURDATE()) < 0, True, False) AS isDead, IF(DATE(j.created_at) = CURDATE(), TRUE, FALSE) AS isToday, IF((l.likey_count > 10), TRUE, false) AS isFame FROM job_search j JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON j.job_id = v.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comment WHERE comment_status = 'active' GROUP BY job_id ) c ON j.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(*) AS likey_count FROM likey WHERE user_id = ${userId} GROUP BY job_id ) l ON j.job_id = l.job_id WHERE j.job_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT job_id FROM likey WHERE user_id = ${userId} ) AND j.job_status = 'active' AND u.user_status != 'deleted' ORDER BY likeyCount DESC
